narration: there you go and they said and they walked next up they went on the boat
scene_description: Sunny seaside dock, small wooden boat bobbing at the pier; a cheerful group walks up, says their goodbyes, and steps onto the boat, ready to go under a bright blue sky.

narration: and then sailed to pumpkin island pumpkin island was quite a pumpkin
scene_description: Out on the water, the boat sails smoothly; ahead, Pumpkin Island appears with big orange pumpkins dotting the shoreline; the friends smile, pointing excitedly as they near the island.

narration: amazing and they went to a pumpkin shop for the lava pumpkins
scene_description: On Pumpkin Island, a cozy pumpkin shop with stacks of pumpkins; shelves show glowing “lava pumpkins” that shine warm orange; the group heads inside, amazed at the display.

narration: they bought one rainbow pumpkin and the next step in the boat they said let's off
scene_description: They buy one rainbow-colored pumpkin and carry it carefully; back at the dock, they step into the boat again, grinning and calling out to set off for the next stop.

narration: to the lory island the lory island was
scene_description: The boat glides toward Lory Island; a green island with a sandy beach comes into view; the group looks ahead eagerly as they arrive at the shoreline.

narration: quite quite quite good they went sat watched some noise
scene_description: On Lory Island, they sit down to rest, watching the lively shore; the surf is noisy and fun, and they laugh, enjoying the good vibes of the place.

narration: and ate all the stuff they had and drank this smoothie lick the lollipop make the pumpkin
scene_description: Beachside picnic: they eat all the food they brought, sip a smoothie, and lick a lollipop; beside them sits their pumpkin, ready for some tasty making.

narration: into pumpkin pie and even ate the mori
scene_description: They turn the pumpkin into a warm pumpkin pie and share slices; they even nibble a little treat called mori, smiling with sticky fingers and happy faces.

narration: they ate everything they had and swam in the beach and came back home
scene_description: After finishing everything, they splash and swim in the gentle beach water, then climb back onto the boat and head home, waving goodbye to the island as the sea sparkles.
